name: DORAL II CONDOMINIUM ASSOCIATION, Appellee, v. PENNSYLVANIA HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Doral II Condominium Ass'n v. Pennsylvania Human Relations Commission

parties: DORAL II CONDOMINIUM ASSOCIATION, Appellee, v. PENNSYLVANIA HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
Justices NIGRO and SAYLOR dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Nancy L. Gippert, Lisa Jo Fanelli-Greer, Elisabeth S. Shuster, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Human Relations Commission.
Terry L. McCallum, Philadelphia, for Doral II Condominium Association.
casebody.head_matter:
810 A.2d 634
DORAL II CONDOMINIUM ASSOCIATION, Appellee, v. PENNSYLVANIA HUMAN RELATIONS COMMISSION, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 23, 2002.
Decided Nov. 13, 2002.
Nancy L. Gippert, Lisa Jo Fanelli-Greer, Elisabeth S. Shuster, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Human Relations Commission.
Terry L. McCallum, Philadelphia, for Doral II Condominium Association.
